subject: Football
lead_paragraph: Jets’ offensive lineman Pete Kendall is considered a sort of Tony Snow in sweats; he has a wry sense of humor and will speak for his tight-lipped bosses and his skittish peers.
snippet: Jets’ offensive lineman Pete Kendall is considered a sort of Tony Snow in sweats; he has a wry sense of humor and will speak for his tight-lipped bosses and his skittish peers.
